columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: OB_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the order base line.

columns.name: PACKAGING_REFERENCE_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The packaging reference unit GID. The package reference unit (PRU) define another dimension to describe the consumption and capacity associated to building the order release ship units for transport. An example could be value of goods, loading meters, etc.

columns.name: UNIT_PRU_COUNT
columns.description: The packaging unit reference (PRU) count being described as how much of the PRU does this line consume.

columns.name: TOTAL_PRU_COUNT
columns.description: The total packaging unit reference (PRU) count being described as how much of the PRU does this line consume against the upper limit.
